scoring.ska_sdc.common.models.sdc_score module

class src.scoring.ska_sdc.common.models.sdc_score.SdcScore[source]

Bases: object

Simple data container class for collating data relating to an SDC score.

This is created by the SDC Scorer’s run method.

property value

The score for the last run.

Returns

float64
